official-title.#text:
To establish the United States Advisory Council on Human Trafficking to review Federal Government
			 policy on human trafficking.

to

text.#text: Every year beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

text.#text: shall not be considered employees of the United States Government for any purpose; and

usc-appendix/5

text.#text: This section shall cease to be effective on September 30, 2020.
